name: Suspicious ConfigSecurityPolicy Execution
description: Upload file, credentials or data exfiltration with Binary part of Windows Defender
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.command_line:*ConfigSecurityPolicy.exe* OR process.executable:*\\ConfigSecurityPolicy.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:ConfigSecurityPolicy.exe) AND process.command_line:(*https\:\/\/* OR *http\:\/\/* OR *ftp\:\/\/*))`
